net.consensys.cava.rlpx

Interface RLPxService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VertxRLPxService

    public interface RLPxService
    Service allowing connections to remote peers over RLPx connections.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void broadcast(WireSubProtocolMessage message)
      Sends a wire message to all connected peers.
      AsyncCompletion connectTo(SECP256K1.PublicKey peerPublicKey, java.net.InetSocketAddress peerAddress)
      Connects to a remote peer
      WireConnectionRepository repository()
      Gets the wire connections repository associated with this service.
      void send(WireSubProtocolMessage message)
      Sends a wire message to a peer.
      AsyncCompletion start()
      Starts the service.
      AsyncCompletion stop()
      Stops the service.

    • Method Detail

      • connectTo

        AsyncCompletion connectTo(SECP256K1.PublicKey peerPublicKey,
                          java.net.InetSocketAddress peerAddress)
        Connects to a remote peer
        Parameters:
        peerPublicKey - the peer public key
        peerAddress - the peer host and port
        Returns:
        a handle that completes if the peer connects successfully.

      • start

        AsyncCompletion start()
        Starts the service.
        Returns:
        a future handler tracking starting the service.

      • stop

        AsyncCompletion stop()
        Stops the service.
        Returns:
        a future handler tracking stopping the service.

      • send

        void send(WireSubProtocolMessage message)
        Sends a wire message to a peer.
        Parameters:
        message - the message, addressed to a connection.

      • broadcast

        void broadcast(WireSubProtocolMessage message)
        Sends a wire message to all connected peers.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to broadcast.

      • repository

        WireConnectionRepository repository()
        Gets the wire connections repository associated with this service.
        Returns:
        the repository of wire connections associated with this service.
